OUTPUTDIRCTRL.description: SCT output counter direction control register

MATCH%s.description: SCT match value register of match channels 0 to 15; REGMOD0 to REGMODE15 = 0

FRACMAT%s.description: Fractional match registers 0 to 5 for SCT match value registers 0 to 5.

CAP%s.description: SCT capture register of capture channel 0 to 15; REGMOD0 to REGMODE15 = 1

MATCHREL%s.description: SCT match reload value register 0 to 15; REGMOD0 = 0 to REGMODE15 = 0

FRACMATREL%s.description: Fractional match reload registers 0 to 5 for SCT match value registers 0 to 5.

CAPCTRL%s.description: SCT capture control register 0 to 15; REGMOD0 = 1 to REGMODE15 = 1

INTTCSTAT.description: DMA Interrupt Terminal Count Request Status Register

INTTCCLEAR.description: DMA Interrupt Terminal Count Request Clear Register

RAWINTTCSTAT.description: DMA Raw Interrupt Terminal Count Status Register

RAWINTERRSTAT.description: DMA Raw Error Interrupt Status Register

SOFTLBREQ.description: DMA Software Last Burst Request Register

SOFTLSREQ.description: DMA Software Last Single Request Register

C%sLLI.description: DMA Channel Linked List Item Register

TCBCNT.description: Transferred CIU Card Byte Count Register

TBBCNT.description: Transferred Host to BIU-FIFO Byte Count Register

CONTROL.description: Controls operation of the memory controller.

CONFIG.description: Configures operation of the memory controller.

DYNAMICREADCONFIG.description: Configures the dynamic memory read strategy.

DYNAMICRAS.description: Selects the active to precharge command period.

DYNAMICAPR.description: Selects the last-data-out to active command time.

DYNAMICDAL.description: Selects the data-in to active command time.

DYNAMICRC.description: Selects the active to active command period.

DYNAMICXSR.description: Selects the exit self-refresh to active command time.

DYNAMICRRD.description: Selects the active bank A to active bank B latency.

DYNAMICMRD.description: Selects the load mode register to active command time.

STATICEXTENDEDWAIT.description: Selects time for long static memory read and write transfers.

DYNAMICCONFIG%s.description: Selects the configuration information for dynamic memory chip select 0.

DYNAMICRASCAS%s.description: Selects the RAS and CAS latencies for dynamic memory chip select 0.

STATICCONFIG%s.description: Selects the memory configuration for static chip select 0.

STATICWAITWEN%s.description: Selects the delay from chip select 0 to write enable.

STATICWAITOEN%s.description: Selects the delay from chip select 0 or address change, whichever is later, to output enable.

STATICWAITRD%s.description: Selects the delay from chip select 0 to a read access.

STATICWAITPAGE%s.description: Selects the delay for asynchronous page mode sequential accesses for chip select 0.

STATICWAITWR%s.description: Selects the delay from chip select 0 to a write access.

STATICWAITTURN%s.description: Selects the number of bus turnaround cycles for chip select 0.

ENDPOINTLISTADDR.description: Address of endpoint list in memory

ASYNCLISTADDR.description: Address of endpoint list in memory

TTCTRL.description: Asynchronous buffer status for embedded TT (host mode)

TXFILLTUNING.description: Host transmit pre-buffer packet tuning (host mode)

POL.description: Clock and Signal Polarity Control register

UPBASE.description: Upper Panel Frame Base Address register

LPBASE.description: Lower Panel Frame Base Address register

UPCURR.description: Upper Panel Current Address Value register

LPCURR.description: Lower Panel Current Address Value register

HIGHWORD.description: System time higher word seconds register

DMA_MFRM_BUFOF.description: Missed frame and buffer overflow register

DMA_CURHOST_TRANS_BUF.description: Current host transmit buffer address register

DMA_CURHOST_REC_BUF.description: Current host receive buffer address register

CREG0.description: Chip configuration register 32 kHz oscillator output and BOD control register.

CREG5.description: Chip configuration register 5. Controls JTAG access.

FLASHCFGA.description: Flash accelerator configuration register for flash bank A

FLASHCFGB.description: Flash accelerator configuration register for flash bank B

CREG6.description: Chip configuration register 6. Controls multiple functions : Ethernet interface, SCT output, I2S0/1 inputs, EMC clock.

ADOM.description: Alarm value for Day of Month

ADOW.description: Alarm value for Day of Week

ADOY.description: Alarm value for Day of Year

ERCONTRO.description: Event Monitor/Recorder Control register. Contains bits that control actions for the event channels as well as for Event Monitor/Recorder setup.

ERSTATUS.description: Event Monitor/Recorder Status register. Contains status flags for event channels and other Event Monitor/Recorder conditions.

ERCOUNTERS.description: Event Monitor/Recorder Counters register. Allows reading the counters associated with the event channels.

ERFIRSTSTAMP%s.description: Event Monitor/Recorder First Stamp register for channel 0. Retains the time stamp for the first event on channel 0.

ERLASTSTAMP%s.description: Event Monitor/Recorder Last Stamp register for channel 0. Retains the time stamp for the last (i.e. most recent) event on channel 0.

BASE_SAFE_CLK.description: Output stage 0 control register for base clock BASE_SAFE_CLK

BASE_USB0_CLK.description: Output stage 1 control register for base clock BASE_USB0_CLK

BASE_PERIPH_CLK.description: Output stage 2 control register for base clock BASE_PERIPH_CLK

BASE_USB1_CLK.description: Output stage 3 control register for base clock BASE_USB1_CLK

BASE_OUT_CLK.description: Output stage 20 control register for base clock BASE_OUT_CLK

BASE_AUDIO_CLK.description: Output stage 25 control register for base clock BASE_AUDIO_CLK

BASE_CGU_OUT0_CLK.description: Output stage 25 control register for base clock BASE_CGU_OUT0_CLK

BASE_CGU_OUT1_CLK.description: Output stage 25 control register for base clock BASE_CGU_OUT1_CLK

RESET_EXT_STAT1.description: Reset external status register 1 for PERIPH_RST

RESET_EXT_STAT2.description: Reset external status register 2 for MASTER_RST

RESET_EXT_STAT5.description: Reset external status register 5 for CREG_RST

MOD.description: Watchdog mode register. This register contains the basic mode and status of the Watchdog Timer.

TC.description: Watchdog timer constant register. This register determines the time-out value.

FEED.description: Watchdog feed sequence register. Writing 0xAA followed by 0x55 to this register reloads the Watchdog timer with the value contained in WDTC.

TV.description: Watchdog timer value register. This register reads out the current value of the Watchdog timer.

WARNINT.description: Watchdog warning interrupt register. This register contains the Watchdog warning interrupt compare value.

WINDOW.description: Watchdog timer window register. This register contains the Watchdog window value.

RBR.description: Receiver Buffer Register. Contains the next received character to be read (DLAB = 0).

THR.description: Transmit Holding Register. The next character to be transmitted is written here (DLAB = 0).

DLL.description: Divisor Latch LSB. Least significant byte of the baud rate divisor value. The full divisor is used to generate a baud rate from the fractional rate divider (DLAB = 1).

DLM.description: Divisor Latch MSB. Most significant byte of the baud rate divisor value. The full divisor is used to generate a baud rate from the fractional rate divider (DLAB = 1).

IER.description: Interrupt Enable Register. Contains individual interrupt enable bits for the 7 potential USART interrupts (DLAB = 0).

IIR.description: Interrupt ID Register. Identifies which interrupt(s) are pending.

FCR.description: FIFO Control Register. Controls USART FIFO usage and modes.

LCR.description: Line Control Register. Contains controls for frame formatting and break generation.

LSR.description: Line Status Register. Contains flags for transmit and receive status, including line errors.

SCR.description: Scratch Pad Register. Eight-bit temporary storage for software.

ACR.description: Auto-baud Control Register. Contains controls for the auto-baud feature.

FDR.description: Fractional Divider Register. Generates a clock input for the baud rate divider.

OSR.description: Oversampling Register. Controls the degree of oversampling during each bit time.

RS485CTRL.description: RS-485/EIA-485 Control. Contains controls to configure various aspects of RS-485/EIA-485 modes.

RS485ADRMATCH.description: RS-485/EIA-485 address match. Contains the address match value for RS-485/EIA-485 mode.

TER.description: Transmit Enable Register. Turns off USART transmitter for use with software flow control.

CR0.description: Control Register 0. Selects the serial clock rate, bus type, and data size.

CR1.description: Control Register 1. Selects master/slave and other modes.

DR.description: Data Register. Writes fill the transmit FIFO, and reads empty the receive FIFO.

IMSC.description: Interrupt Mask Set and Clear Register

SFSP0_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P0

SFSP1_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P1

SFSP1_17.description: Pin configuration register for pins P1_17

SFSP2_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P2

SFSP3_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P3

SFSP3_3.description: Pin configuration register for pins P3

SFSP4_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P4

SFSP5_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P5

SFSP6_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P6

SFSP7_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P7

SFSP8_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P8

SFSP9_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins P9

SFSPA_0.description: Pin configuration register for pins PA

SFSPA_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins PA

SFSPA_4.description: Pin configuration register for pins PA

SFSPB_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins PB

SFSPC_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins PC

SFSPD_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins PD

SFSPE_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins PE

SFSPF_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins PF

SFSCLK_%s.description: Pin configuration register for pins CLK

SFSUSB.description: Pin configuration register for pins USB1_DM and USB1_DP

SFSI2C0.description: Pin configuration register for I2C0-bus pins

SDDELAY.description: SD/MMC sample and drive delay register

PINTSEL0.description: Pin interrupt select register for pin interrupts 0 to 3.

PINTSEL1.description: Pin interrupt select register for pin interrupts 4 to 7.

IENF.description: Pin Interrupt Enable Falling Edge / Active Level register

SIENF.description: Set Pin Interrupt Enable Falling Edge / Active Level register

CIENF.description: Clear Pin Interrupt Enable Falling Edge / Active Level address

CONSET.description: I2C Control Set Register. When a one is written to a bit of this register, the corresponding bit in the I2C control register is set. Writing a zero has no effect on the corresponding bit in the I2C control register.

STAT.description: I2C Status Register. During I2C operation, this register provides detailed status codes that allow software to determine the next action needed.

DAT.description: I2C Data Register. During master or slave transmit mode, data to be transmitted is written to this register. During master or slave receive mode, data that has been received may be read from this register.

ADR0.description: I2C Slave Address Register 0. Contains the 7-bit slave address for operation of the I2C interface in slave mode, and is not used in master mode. The least significant bit determines whether a slave responds to the General Call address.

SCLH.description: SCH Duty Cycle Register High Half Word. Determines the high time of the I2C clock.

SCLL.description: SCL Duty Cycle Register Low Half Word. Determines the low time of the I2C clock. SCLL and SCLH together determine the clock frequency generated by an I2C master and certain times used in slave mode.

CONCLR.description: I2C Control Clear Register. When a one is written to a bit of this register, the corresponding bit in the I2C control register is cleared. Writing a zero has no effect on the corresponding bit in the I2C control register.

ADR%s.description: I2C Slave Address Register. Contains the 7-bit slave address for operation of the I2C interface in slave mode, and is not used in master mode. The least significant bit determines whether a slave responds to the General Call address.

DATA_BUFFER.description: Data buffer register. The contents of the 8 MSBs of the DAT shift register will be transferred to the DATA_BUFFER automatically after every nine bits (8 bits of data plus ACK or NACK) has been received on the bus.

DAO.description: I2S Digital Audio Output Register. Contains control bits for the I2S transmit channel.

DAI.description: I2S Digital Audio Input Register. Contains control bits for the I2S receive channel.

TXFIFO.description: I2S Transmit FIFO. Access register for the 8 x 32-bit transmitter FIFO.

RXFIFO.description: I2S Receive FIFO. Access register for the 8 x 32-bit receiver FIFO.

STATE.description: I2S Status Feedback Register. Contains status information about the I2S interface.

DMA1.description: I2S DMA Configuration Register 1. Contains control information for DMA request 1.

DMA2.description: I2S DMA Configuration Register 2. Contains control information for DMA request 2.

IRQ.description: I2S Interrupt Request Control Register. Contains bits that control how the I2S interrupt request is generated.

TXRATE.description: I2S Transmit MCLK divider. This register determines the I2S TX MCLK rate by specifying the value to divide PCLK by in order to produce MCLK.

RXRATE.description: I2S Receive MCLK divider. This register determines the I2S RX MCLK rate by specifying the value to divide PCLK by in order to produce MCLK.

TXBITRATE.description: I2S Transmit bit rate divider. This register determines the I2S transmit bit rate by specifying the value to divide TX_MCLK by in order to produce the transmit bit clock.

RXBITRATE.description: I2S Receive bit rate divider. This register determines the I2S receive bit rate by specifying the value to divide RX_MCLK by in order to produce the receive bit clock.

FILTERPHA.description: Digital filter register on input phase A (QEI_A)

FILTERPHB.description: Digital filter register on input phase B (QEI_B)

FILTERINX.description: Digital filter register on input index (QEI_IDX)

CAP0_0_IN.description: Timer 0 CAP0_0 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 0)

CAP0_1_IN.description: Timer 0 CAP0_1 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 1)

CAP0_2_IN.description: Timer 0 CAP0_2 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 2)

CAP0_3_IN.description: Timer 0 CAP0_3 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 3)

CAP1_0_IN.description: Timer 1 CAP1_0 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 4)

CAP1_1_IN.description: Timer 1 CAP1_1 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 5)

CAP1_2_IN.description: Timer 1 CAP1_2 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 6)

CAP1_3_IN.description: Timer 1 CAP1_3 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 7)

CAP2_0_IN.description: Timer 2 CAP2_0 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 8)

CAP2_1_IN.description: Timer 2 CAP2_1 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 9)

CAP2_2_IN.description: Timer 2 CAP2_2 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 10)

CAP2_3_IN.description: Timer 2 CAP2_3 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 11)

CAP3_0_IN.description: Timer 3 CAP3_0 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 12)

CAP3_1_IN.description: Timer 3 CAP3_1 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 13)

CAP3_2_IN.description: Timer 3 CAP3_2 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 14)

CAP3_3_IN.description: Timer 3 CAP3_3 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 15)

CTIN_0_IN.description: SCT CTIN_0 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 16)

CTIN_1_IN.description: SCT CTIN_1 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 17)

CTIN_2_IN.description: SCT CTIN_2 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 18)

CTIN_3_IN.description: SCT CTIN_3 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 19)

CTIN_4_IN.description: SCT CTIN_4 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 20)

CTIN_5_IN.description: SCT CTIN_5 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 21)

CTIN_6_IN.description: SCT CTIN_6 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 22)

CTIN_7_IN.description: SCT CTIN_7 capture input multiplexer (GIMA output 23)

CR.description: DAC register. Holds the conversion data.
A/D Control Register. The AD0CR register must be written to select the operating mode before A/D conversion can occur.

GDR.description: A/D Global Data Register. Contains the result of the most recent A/D conversion.

INTEN.description: A/D Interrupt Enable Register. This register contains enable bits that allow the DONE flag of each A/D channel to be included or excluded from contributing to the generation of an A/D interrupt.

DR[%s].description: A/D Channel Data Register. This register contains the result of the most recent conversion completed on channel n.

STAT.description: A/D Status Register. This register contains DONE and OVERRUN flags for all of the A/D channels, as well as the A/D interrupt flag.
